content.question:
Consider the following instance variable and method.

Which of the following is the best postcondition for checkArray ?

choices.label: Returns the index of the last element in array array whose value is greater than array [loc]
Returns the largest value in array array
Returns the index of the largest value in array array
Returns the index of the largest value in the second half of array array

content.answer: Returns the index of the largest value in array array

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
